H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5157.def: = action by which humans or deities take permanent possession of objects, humans, or property, either by inheritance or force

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3667.def: = man; ◄ youngest son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Canaanites<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H499.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H5126.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elishama<SDBH:אֱלִישָׁמָע>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► father of {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>}, who is better known as {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H1486.def: = specially marked object, such as a pebble or piece of pottery, ► used in order to decide questions

H8672.def: = state in which a countable entity is nine in number

H2677.def: = one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

= man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2506.def: = one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H4054.def: = open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats

H7074.def: =  ethnic group ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Kenaz<SDBH:קְנַז>}; of non-Israelite descent; ► later incorporated in tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H6947.def: = town, also known as {L:En Mishpat<SDBH:עֵין מִשְׁפָּט>} , {L:Kedesh<SDBH:קֶדֶשׁ>}, and {L:Kadesh<SDBH:קָדֵשׁ>}; ◄ located in the Wilderness of {L:Zin<SDBH:צִן>}, in the northern part of {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula; ► {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}; it is also the location of the {L:Meribah<SDBH:מְרִיבָה>} spring; spies were sent out into Canaan from this place; it later marked the southern border of the territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H194.def: = marker indicating that the information that follows is possibly true but that there is no complete certainty

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H1288.def: = causative action by which humans cause animals to fall on their knees

H3612.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jephunneh<SDBH:יְפֻנֶּה>}; {L:clan of Kenaz<SDBH:קְנִזִּי>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2275.def: = town, formerly known as {L:Kiriath-Arba<SDBH:קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H2275.def: = town, formerly known as {L:Kiriath-Arba<SDBH:קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H3612.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jephunneh<SDBH:יְפֻנֶּה>}; {L:clan of Kenaz<SDBH:קְנִזִּי>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land

H7074.def: =  ethnic group ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Kenaz<SDBH:קְנַז>}; of non-Israelite descent; ► later incorporated in tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5159.def: = process by which possessions are transferred from one generation to the next

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3282.def: = a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H2275.def: = town, formerly known as {L:Kiriath-Arba<SDBH:קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H7153.def: = town, later known as {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>}; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; named after one of the {L:Anakites<SDBH:עֲנָק>}

H120.def: = human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between {L:male<SDBH:זָכָר>} and {L:female<SDBH:נְקֵבָה>}; ≈ associated with mortality

H6062.def: = race of giants; ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Anak<SDBH:עֲנָק>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8252.def: = state in which an inanimate object does not move

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
